data.message:
Mark, 

You delivered an inspiring speech not only to the 2017 Harvard graduates but to the whole world 🌎. It is important to have a purpose but even greater to have united purposes. I hope that one day we will discover the cure for all diseases. I hope that we tame climate change. 

Great speech, 

Kalen Sanchez

replies.message: Thank you for your kind words, Kalen. Have a great day! -Caitlin

Climate change is needed, it's a natural balance. 

I doubt his speech did any good for the people of ISIS/USUAL or those who are in martial law in the Philippines...

But Mark, don't go as far crazy as Bill Gates and you may turn out to be a decent human at the end of your ride on life.
